src:
Begini Reaksi Paul Pogba Soal Manchester United yang Kembali Kalah
04 Nov 2019, 06:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United kembali menelan kekalahan yang menyakitkan di ajang Premier League. Padahal, mereka baru saja berusaha bangkit dengan menorehkan sejumlah hasil positif dalam beberapa pekan terakhir.
Klub besutan Ole Gunnar Solskjaer tersebut pulang tertunduk lesu saat bertemu Bournemouth dalam ajang Premier League, Sabtu (2/11/2019). Bermain di Dean Court, Marcus Rashford dkk harus menerima kekalahan dengan skor tipis 0-1.
Hasil itu membuat Manchester United harus kembali terdampar ke peringkat 10 klasemen sementara Premier League. Merusak torehan apik yang sempat membawa mereka duduk di posisi tujuh.
Sebelum menghadapi Bournemouth, the Red Devils selalu meraih kemenangan dalam tiga pertandingan sebelumnya. Bahkan saat bertemu dengan Chelsea dalam laga 16 besar Carabao Cup.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
This is Paul Pogba's reaction to Manchester United's Losing Return
Nov 04 2019, 06:05 by Bola.net
Manchester - Manchester United have again suffered a painful defeat in the Premier League. In fact, they have just tried to get up with incised a number of positive results in recent weeks.
The club made by Ole Gunnar Solskjaer came home bowed sluggishly when he met Bournemouth in the Premier League event, Saturday (11/02/2019). Playing at Dean Court, Marcus Rashford et al must accept defeat with a thin score of 0-1.
The result left Manchester United back in the 10th place in the Premier League. Damaging slick nicks that could bring them to sit in position seven.
Before facing Bournemouth, the Red Devils always won in the previous three matches. Even when meeting with Chelsea in the 16th match of the Carabao Cup.
